attributes.action: Abolish the Department of Communities and Local Government (AKA ODPM), and sack John Prescott for being a national disgrace and embarrassment, thus saving the tax payer £2.5M per annum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Prescott is a philandering buffoon who is an embarrassment and a disgrace to this country. The Department of Communities and Local Government is nothing but a sinecure set up to allow Prescott to remain in office, despite failing to achieve anything in 9 years as DPM. This would return an estimated £2.5M to the exchequer.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
